column4: BeOs did some very neat things right.. and i found some things very wrong.. but its all sort of moot in many ways. :(
it did two things wrong:  poor net stack, and not multiuser.
tjhere was other 'little' bits i hated also.
but every os/pc/tool has its issues in one way or another.
